name: Better Destiny.gg
body:
# Chrome
Version 0.2 - [Download](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/better-destinygg/ilhmkkocekbajiikponcokjdabiipecj)

# Firefox
Version 0.2 - [Download](https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/better-destinygg/)

# Changelog
v0.2
* Added Firefox support
* Greentext for all (thanks ILiedAboutCake)
* Multiemote for all

v0.1
* Initial release for Chrome
* Shows deleted messages of muted or banned chatters
* Restores deleted emotes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
